tool_description: Asks user for an input based on a condition and returns the user's input or a standard message stating no user input is required for answering the query.
title: humaninteract

api_list.name: interact_with_human
api_list.description: Conditionally requests user for an input, and returns their input or a predefined message stating no user input is required for answering the query.

required_parameters.name: requires_input
required_parameters.description: A flag to determine if user input is needed (1) or not (0)

optional_parameters.name: input_text
optional_parameters.description: The text given to the human to respond to.
